version_description:
Hello Hanger-fans! We're very excited to introduce a new game mode called: Challenge Mode! 

The first challenge is called "Long Jump". Jump as far as possible while the audience goes crazy! Bodyparts will fly, highscores and limbs will be broken!

Enjoy!

Hello Hanger fans from across the world! Here's a brand new update for you!

- New Challenge: Level 1-1! Can you get the best time?
- New Character: Jump Man! Swinging around with a mustache!
- Now you can play your own music while swinging around! Instructions: First start the game then start your own music to swing around to your favourite tunes!
- Tweaks & Bug fixes!
- Smaller app size!

Enjoy! Thanks for your support!

•  New playable character "Ron T"!
•  New challenge Tronville Rush - get as far as you can in 20 seconds!
•  Bug fixes and improvements!
•  Faster restart on levels!
•  Test with new, less intrusive ads!
•  Special limited version of the title music!

Thank you for playing Hanger!
We're currently working on a new top secret project in our laboratory, so stay tuned for that!
As always you can reach us at our facebook page.

Thanks!
A Small Game

We have fixed the most evil bug ever encountered! The performance issues some of you had should now be a thing of the past!

A big thank you to everyone who reported about these issues in the comments!

Keep on swinging!
A Small Game

- New character: Zombie Grrrl! As requested by Lisa in a review!
- The Hangers are now a bit tougher!
- Screen shake when you hit something hard!
- Adjusted camera, now you see further ahead!
- More blood!

Keep on swinging!

Like us on facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/ASmallGame

- New character: Mega Pig!
- Tweaks & Fixes!
- Special Secret Sauce!

Swing tight! And don't forget to check out our latest game Hanger World, available now on the App Store!

Schwing-a-ling! In this update we bring you:

- The mysterious Ninja! Are you having a hard time swinging around, constantly losing your body parts? Then use the new super tough Ninja! You'll even get a second chance if you happen to fall of the screen with the Ninja Save™!
- Names of the Hangers are now being read out loud! :)
- Bug fixes & tweaks!
- New Icon!

Have you played Hanger World yet, the sequel to Hanger? It even has a level editor that lets you share your own Hanger levels with anyone!

Time to swing around like Spider-Man once again! :) Enjoy this bug fixing, game tweaking update!
If you think Hanger is fun, then check our latest game Hanger World! It's like Hanger with added obstacles like Buzz Saws, Propellers and more! With a Level Editor!

• Tweaks!
• Bug Fixes!
• New Keywords!
• New Poster Frame!

Schwing-a-ling folks!

1.97

Time to swing around like Spider-Man once again! :) Enjoy this bug fixing, game tweaking update!
If you think Hanger is fun, then check our latest game Hanger World! It's like Hanger with added obstacles like Buzz Saws, Propellers and more! With a Level Editor!

• Tweaks!
• Bug Fixes!
• New Keywords!
• New Poster Frame!

Schwing-a-ling folks!

1.98

Bug Fixes!

Boom! Watch out! Here's Hanger 2.0!

A big shoutout to everyone that's been playing Hanger since the first version was released back in 2012! We felt that it was time to give the game a total makeover! Enjoy!

- Levels have been updated with beautiful new Retina HD Graphics, bursting with detail!
- We've added dangerous obstacles like Buzz Saws, Lasers, Monsters and more! Watch your limbs!
- New high-res graphics for all the Characters!
- Settings - Turn on/off Blood, On-screen Buttons, Music and SFX!
- Total overhaul of the games presentation & menus!
- Loads and loads of Bug Fixes and Tweaks!

We're not stopping here though! Future updates will include Replay Kit (Record & Share your gameplay) and HD Graphics for all levels and game modes!

facebook.com/ASmallGame

Don't HANG around here - go play the game! :)

2.01

- Fixed a nasty bug that made the game crash for those with iOS 8! Let us know if it works or not!
- Minor changes and tweaks!

2.0

Boom! Watch out! Here's Hanger 2.0!

A big shoutout to everyone that's been playing Hanger since the first version was released back in 2012! We felt that it was time to give the game a total makeover! Enjoy!

- Levels have been updated with beautiful new Retina HD Graphics, bursting with detail!
- We've added dangerous obstacles like Buzz Saws, Lasers, Monsters and more! Watch your limbs!
- New high-res graphics for all the Characters!
- Settings - Turn on/off Blood, On-screen Buttons, Music and SFX!
- Total overhaul of the games presentation & menus!
- Loads and loads of Bug Fixes and Tweaks!

We're not stopping here though! Future updates will include Replay Kit (Record & Share your gameplay) and HD Graphics for all levels and game modes!

facebook.com/ASmallGame

Don't HANG around here - go play the game! :)

• Levelpack 3 is now updated with new HD Graphics and crazy obstacles! Try it!
• Loads of Bug Fixes & Tweaks!

Swing Tight!

- HUGE performance update! The game should run smoother than ever before!
- Bug Fixes & Tweaks!

If you like the game please leave a review, that would mean a lot!

Swing you later!

• New icon.
• Fixes for iOS 11.
• Bug fixes & tweaks.

Thank you for playing Hanger! Please leave a review if you like the game!

Thank you for playing Hanger!
